price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߘߊ߲߫ ߣߊ߰ߘߌ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߓߐ߰ ߘߐߕߐ߬ߞߎ߬ߟߐ߬ߣߍ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
